TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_R’ra’, title = R’ra’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/R’ra’} }

S.FORM: R'ra' Itiniay i Wufeng Cen no Hsinchu ko R'ra' a niyaro', 67 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 176 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 88% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 155 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 12% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 21 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal87%, roma1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

R'ra' Itiniay i Wofeng Cen no Hsincho ko R'ra' a niyaro', 67 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 176 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 88% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 155 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 12% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 21 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal87%, roma1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
